page.title: 20MEDIA IN DELABOLE
page.content: By Heidi Henderson and Paula Hicks. {Village Newsletter. In Delabole we produce a mini- paper called The Delabole Slate with news and views about Delabole.It is a 6-page newsletter which Class 3 children deliver round Delabole.The July issue includes reports of events: the Sponsored Walk, the British Legion Summer Fete, Christian Aid Week and the Football Club A.G.M. There are notes on the District and the Parish Councils.It details forthcoming events and adverts of local firms. {Newspapers and magazines. We have two paper shops which sell the daily papers like The Sun, Daily Star, Mirror, Express etc. One of the shops only sells papers on Sundays. There are comics and magazines in the paper shop like Jackie,Smash hits,Suzy etc.
